summary: Website project with home page, multiple tabs (Overview, Additional Resources), and content management features
architectural_notes: Content persistence required across feature implementations

existing_features.title: Rename the 'Mission' navigation tab to 'Overview' throughout the application
Add a new 'Additional Resources' tab to the navigation menu and create corresponding page component
Add a section on the home page below the mission text for displaying links with thumbnails
Add dialog component for creating and editing home page links with thumbnail upload
Add delete button and functionality to all article posts in Latest Progress section
Add delete button and functionality to all X Posts
Add delete button and functionality to all Ecosystem Spotlight entries
Add delete button and functionality to all Investing Wisdom entries
Add delete button and functionality to all Trusted Resources entries
Add delete button and functionality to all Cybercrime Awareness articles
Add delete functionality for home page links with thumbnails

new_feature_requests.summary: Add links and thumbnails section on home page below text
Add delete button for all posts (posts, pictures, links, etc)
Create backend data model and CRUD operations for home page links with thumbnails

projectName: Add home page links section, rename Mission tab, add delete functionality, and create Additional Resources tab
